introduction_key1: Iss project mei hum log `hangman` game develop karenge.
introduction_key2: Game ko samajhne ke liye aap
introduction_key4: par ja kar iss game ko khel sakte hai. Bahut simple sa game hai. Fir neeche diye hue video ko dekh lo.
introduction_key6: Jitne uss words mei characters hote hai, utne letters ke jagah computer `_` show karta hai
introduction_key7: User koi letter guess karta hai
introduction_key8: Agar woh letter uss word mei hota hai, toh computer aapko woh word mei uss jagah `_` replace kar kar, woh letters show karta hai
introduction_key9: Aisa chalta rehta hai, jab tak aap word ko sahi se guess nahi kar paatein
introduction_key10: Game mei aur bhi bahut saari cheezein ki jaa sakti hai
introduction_key11:
**Hint**
User ek baar hint maang sakta hai, aur computer user ko ek letter reveal kar sakta hai
introduction_key12:
**Limited Lives**
User ko kuch hi lives do, agar woh lives khatam ho jaye, toh "Game Over" dikhao
introduction_key13:
**Animation ya Design**
Aap game ko improve karne ke liye animations ya design add kar sakte hai
introduction_key14:
Aap apne bhi ideas soch kar implement kar sakte hai.
Chalo baatein bahut hui, ab `code` karna shuru karte hai :-)
